title: Cocktail Books: Here’s to Growing Up
sub_head: Learning to mix—or at least appreciate—an elegant drink can be a rite of passage.
body:
Cocktails may be our last best hope for bringing maturity to an infantilized society.
Time was when college graduates declared they had put away their childish things by donning tailored worsted suits and lacing up cap-toe oxfords. Now, what counts as corporate workwear—hoodies, T-shirts, jeans and sneakers—is indistinguishable from adolescent video-gaming getups.
